Principal.Java:
package App;

public class Principal {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		Frame1 frame = new Frame1();
		frame.setVisible(true);
	}

}
Frame 1:
package App;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.EventQueue;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder;
import java.awt.Window.Type;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;
import javax.swing.JButton;
import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
import javax.swing.JTextField;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.sql.Statement;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;

public class Frame1 extends JFrame {

	private JPanel contentPane;
	private JTextField txtNombre;
	private JTextField txtPassword;

	/**
	 * Create the frame.
	 */
	public Frame1() {
		setResizable(false);
		setType(Type.UTILITY);
		setBounds(100, 100, 370, 370);
		contentPane = new JPanel();
		contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(5, 5, 5, 5));
		setContentPane(contentPane);
		contentPane.setLayout(null);
		
		JLabel lblNewLabel_1 = new JLabel("");
		lblNewLabel_1.setIcon(new ImageIcon(Frame1.class.getResource("/imagenes/user.png")));
		lblNewLabel_1.setBounds(102, 139, 24, 24);
		contentPane.add(lblNewLabel_1);
		
		JLabel lblNewLabel_2 = new JLabel("");
		lblNewLabel_2.setIcon(new ImageIcon(Frame1.class.getResource("/imagenes/lock.png")));
		lblNewLabel_2.setBounds(102, 179, 24, 33);
		contentPane.add(lblNewLabel_2);
		
		JButton btnAceptar = new JButton("Aceptar");
		btnAceptar.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				 
				try {
					int resultado = 0;
                    Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
                    java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");
                    Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();
                    ResultSet resultset = sm.executeQuery("SELECT Nom_Usuario,Pass_Usuario FROM usuario WHERE Nom_Usuario = '"+ txtNombre.getText()+"'AND Pass_Usuario = '"+txtPassword.getText()+"'");

                    if(resultset.next()) {
                    	resultado = 1;
                    	if (resultado==1) {
                    		
                    		Frame2 frame = new Frame2();
        					frame.setVisible(true);
                    	}
                    	
                       
                    }else {
                        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnAceptar, "Usuario No encontrado");
                        
                    }

                    conexion.close();

                }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
                    a1.printStackTrace();

                }catch (SQLException a1) {
                    a1.printStackTrace();
                }
			
					
			}
		});
		btnAceptar.setBounds(82, 248, 89, 23);
		contentPane.add(btnAceptar);
		
		JButton btnCancelar = new JButton("Cancelar");
		btnCancelar.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				System.exit(0);
			}
		});
		btnCancelar.setBounds(181, 248, 89, 23);
		contentPane.add(btnCancelar);
		
		JLabel lblNewLabel = new JLabel("");
		lblNewLabel.setIcon(new ImageIcon(Frame1.class.getResource("/imagenes/profile (1).png")));
		lblNewLabel.setBounds(139, 39, 73, 74);
		contentPane.add(lblNewLabel);
		
		txtNombre = new JTextField();
		txtNombre.setBounds(136, 143, 89, 20);
		contentPane.add(txtNombre);
		txtNombre.setColumns(10);
		
		txtPassword = new JTextField();
		txtPassword.setBounds(136, 192, 89, 20);
		contentPane.add(txtPassword);
		txtPassword.setColumns(10);
	}


	}
Frame 2:
package App;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.EventQueue;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder;
import javax.swing.JButton;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import javax.swing.ImageIcon;

public class Frame2 extends JFrame {

	private JPanel contentPane;

	
	/**
	 * Create the frame.
	 */
	public Frame2() {
		setResizable(false);
		setBounds(100, 100, 370, 370);
		contentPane = new JPanel();
		contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(5, 5, 5, 5));
		setContentPane(contentPane);
		contentPane.setLayout(null);
		
		JButton btnNewButton = new JButton("Catalogo");
		btnNewButton.setIcon(new ImageIcon(Frame2.class.getResource("/imagenes/catalogo.png")));
		btnNewButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VENCatalogo frame = new VENCatalogo();
				frame.setVisible(true);
			}
		});
		btnNewButton.setBounds(92, 75, 184, 41);
		contentPane.add(btnNewButton);
		
		JButton btnNewButton_1 = new JButton("Cerrar sesi\u00F3n");
		btnNewButton_1.setIcon(new ImageIcon(Frame2.class.getResource("/imagenes/opcion-de-marcha (1).png")));
		btnNewButton_1.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				Frame2.this.dispose();
	            setVisible(false);
			}
		});
		btnNewButton_1.setBounds(92, 200, 184, 41);
		contentPane.add(btnNewButton_1);
		
		JButton btnNewButton_2 = new JButton("   Mi Carrito");
		btnNewButton_2.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VENCarrito frame = new VENCarrito();
				frame.setVisible(true);
			}
		});
		btnNewButton_2.setIcon(new ImageIcon(Frame2.class.getResource("/imagenes/agregar-carrito.png")));
		btnNewButton_2.setBounds(92, 137, 184, 41);
		contentPane.add(btnNewButton_2);
	}
}
VenCatalogo:
package App;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.EventQueue;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder;
import javax.swing.JComboBox;
import javax.swing.JButton;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;

public class VENCatalogo extends JFrame {

	private JPanel contentPane;

	/**
	 * Create the frame.
	 */
	public VENCatalogo() {
		setTitle("Catalogo");
		setResizable(false);
		setBounds(100, 100, 370, 370);
		contentPane = new JPanel();
		contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(5, 5, 5, 5));
		setContentPane(contentPane);
		contentPane.setLayout(null);
		
		JButton btnNewButton = new JButton("Cemento");
		btnNewButton.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VenCemento frame = new VenCemento();
				frame.setVisible(true);
			}
		});
		btnNewButton.setBounds(24, 26, 121, 87);
		contentPane.add(btnNewButton);
		
		JButton btnNewButton_1 = new JButton("Varilla");
		btnNewButton_1.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VenVarilla frame = new VenVarilla();
				frame.setVisible(true);
			}
		});
		btnNewButton_1.setBounds(218, 26, 121, 87);
		contentPane.add(btnNewButton_1);
		
		JButton btnNewButton_2 = new JButton("Mortero");
		btnNewButton_2.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VenMortero frame = new VenMortero();
				frame.setVisible(true);
			}
		});
		btnNewButton_2.setBounds(24, 163, 121, 85);
		contentPane.add(btnNewButton_2);
		
		JButton btnNewButton_3 = new JButton("Block /Yeso");
		btnNewButton_3.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VenBlock frame = new VenBlock();
				frame.setVisible(true);
			}
		});
		btnNewButton_3.setBounds(218, 163, 121, 85);
		contentPane.add(btnNewButton_3);
		
		JButton btnRegresar = new JButton("Regresar");
		btnRegresar.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VENCatalogo.this.dispose();
		            setVisible(false);
			}
		});
		btnRegresar.setBounds(106, 281, 147, 33);
		contentPane.add(btnRegresar);
	}
}

VenCarrito:
package App;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.EventQueue;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder;
import javax.swing.JButton;
import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
import javax.swing.JTable;
import javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel;

import com.mysql.jdbc.Statement;

import javax.swing.JLabel;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;
import javax.swing.JTextField;
import javax.swing.border.BevelBorder;
import javax.swing.border.EtchedBorder;
import javax.swing.JTextPane;
import javax.swing.JRadioButton;
import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;

@SuppressWarnings("unused")
public class VENCarrito extends JFrame {

    private JPanel contentPane;
   

    private static JTable table;
    
    public static void AddRow(Object[] dataRow) {

        DefaultTableModel model=(DefaultTableModel)table.getModel();
        model.addRow(dataRow);
    }
    
    public VENCarrito() {
    	setResizable(false);
        setTitle("Productos");
        setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
        setBounds(100, 100, 333, 400);
        contentPane = new JPanel();
        contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(5, 5, 5, 5));
        setContentPane(contentPane);
        contentPane.setLayout(null);

        JScrollPane scrollPane = new JScrollPane();
        scrollPane.setBounds(10, 118, 297, 232);
        contentPane.add(scrollPane);

        table = new JTable();
        table.setModel(new DefaultTableModel(
        	new Object[][] {
        	},
        	new String[] {
        		"ID_Producto", "Nombre", "Precio"
        	}
        ) {
        	Class[] columnTypes = new Class[] {
        		Object.class, String.class, Object.class
        	};
        	public Class getColumnClass(int columnIndex) {
        		return columnTypes[columnIndex];
        	}
        });
        scrollPane.setViewportView(table);

        JLabel lblNewLabel = new JLabel("Mi Carrito");
        lblNewLabel.setBounds(10, 11, 102, 81);
        lblNewLabel.setIcon(new ImageIcon(VENCarrito.class.getResource("/imagenes/agregar-carrito.png")));
        contentPane.add(lblNewLabel);
        
        JButton btnRegresar = new JButton("Regresar");
        btnRegresar.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
        	public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
        		VENCarrito.this.dispose();
	            setVisible(false);
        	}
        });
        btnRegresar.setBounds(170, 35, 147, 33);
        contentPane.add(btnRegresar);
        
        try {
        	String ID,Nombre,Precio;
            Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
            java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

            Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

            String DB = "SELECT * FROM productos ";
            
            ResultSet result=sm.executeQuery(DB);
            
            
           
            while(result.next()){
            	
            VENCarrito.AddRow(new Object[] {

               ID = result.getString("ID_Producto"),
               Nombre = result.getString("Nombre_Producto"),
               Precio = result.getString("Precio_Producto"),
                   
           });
            }
            
            conexion.close();

        }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
            a1.printStackTrace();

        }catch (SQLException a1) {
            a1.printStackTrace();
        }


         
        
    }
}

VenCemento:
package App;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.EventQueue;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder;
import javax.swing.border.TitledBorder;
import javax.swing.JSeparator;
import javax.swing.JButton;
import javax.swing.JSpinner;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;
import javax.swing.JTextField;
import javax.swing.JTextPane;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import javax.swing.event.ChangeListener;

import com.mysql.jdbc.Statement;

import javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent;

public class VenCemento extends JFrame {

	private JPanel contentPane;

	/**
	 * Create the frame.
	 */
	public VenCemento() {
		setResizable(false);
		setBounds(100, 100, 370, 400);
		contentPane = new JPanel();
		contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(5, 5, 5, 5));
		setContentPane(contentPane);
		contentPane.setLayout(null);
		
		JPanel panel = new JPanel();
		panel.setBorder(new TitledBorder(null, "Cemento Blanco", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, null));
		panel.setBounds(10, 0, 158, 316);
		contentPane.add(panel);
		panel.setLayout(null);
		;
		
		
		
		JLabel lblCantidad = new JLabel("Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad.setBounds(14, 246, 78, 14);
		panel.add(lblCantidad);
		
		JTextPane txtpnElCementoBlanco = new JTextPane();
		txtpnElCementoBlanco.setText("El cemento blanco es un tipo de cemento portland de un color gris muy claro,\u200B empleado tanto en piezas prefabricadas como en acabados de suelos y alba\u00F1iler\u00EDa en general.");
		txtpnElCementoBlanco.setBounds(14, 23, 134, 175);
		panel.add(txtpnElCementoBlanco);
		
		JLabel lblCBLANCO = new JLabel("Precio: 600");
		lblCBLANCO.setBounds(14, 207, 78, 28);
		panel.add(lblCBLANCO);
		
		JPanel panel_1 = new JPanel();
		panel_1.setBorder(new TitledBorder(null, "Cemento Gris", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, null));
		panel_1.setBounds(178, 0, 176, 316);
		contentPane.add(panel_1);
		panel_1.setLayout(null);
		
		
		
		JLabel lblCantidad_1 = new JLabel("Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad_1.setBounds(10, 246, 78, 14);
		panel_1.add(lblCantidad_1);
		
		JTextPane txtpnElCementoGris = new JTextPane();
		txtpnElCementoGris.setText("El cemento gris o Portland es un compuesto de minerales que act\u00FAa como ligante de materiales.");
		txtpnElCementoGris.setBounds(10, 25, 156, 175);
		panel_1.add(txtpnElCementoGris);
		
		JLabel lblCGRIS = new JLabel("  Precio: 405");
		lblCGRIS.setBounds(20, 199, 96, 33);
		panel_1.add(lblCGRIS);
		
		JSeparator separator = new JSeparator();
		separator.setBounds(20, 263, 339, 8);
		contentPane.add(separator);
		
		JButton btnRegresar = new JButton("Regresar");
		btnRegresar.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				  VenCemento.this.dispose();
		            setVisible(false);

			}
		});
		btnRegresar.setBounds(102, 327, 147, 33);
		contentPane.add(btnRegresar);
		
	
	
		
		JSpinner C1GRIS = new JSpinner();
		C1GRIS.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
				int Num2= 600;
	            int sp2 = (int) C1GRIS.getValue();
	            int Res2=600*sp2;

	            String resu2 = String.valueOf(Res2);

	            lblCGRIS.setText("Precio: "+ resu2);
			}
		});
		C1GRIS.setBounds(82, 243, 46, 20);
		panel_1.add(C1GRIS);
		
		
		
		

		
	JSpinner C2BLANCO = new JSpinner();
	C2BLANCO.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
		public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
			
			int Num1= 600;
            int sp = (int) C2BLANCO.getValue();
            int Res=600*sp;

            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);

            lblCBLANCO.setText("Precio: "+ resu);
		}
	});
	C2BLANCO.setBounds(88, 240, 44, 20);
	panel.add(C2BLANCO);
	
	JButton btnBlanco = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
	btnBlanco.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
			
			int Num1= 600;
		    int sp = (int) C2BLANCO.getValue();
		    int Res=600*sp;
		    String Nombre="Cemento Blanco";
		    
			try {
                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res+"') ";

                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
                conexion.close();

            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
                a1.printStackTrace();

            }catch (SQLException a1) {
                a1.printStackTrace();
            }

            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnBlanco, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

			
		}
	});
	btnBlanco.setBounds(10, 282, 138, 23);
	panel.add(btnBlanco);
	
	JButton btnGris = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
	btnGris.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
		public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
			
			int Num2= 600;
            int sp2 = (int) C1GRIS.getValue();
            int Res2=600*sp2;
		   String Nombre="Cemento Gris";
			
			try {
                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res2+"') ";

                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
                conexion.close();

            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
                a1.printStackTrace();

            }catch (SQLException a1) {
                a1.printStackTrace();
            }

            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnGris, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

             
			
		}
	});
	btnGris.setBounds(10, 282, 156, 23);
	panel_1.add(btnGris);
	
	}
	
	
	
	protected static void HIDE_ON_CLOSE(boolean b) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
	}
}

VenVarilla:
package App;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.EventQueue;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder;
import javax.swing.border.TitledBorder;
import javax.swing.JCheckBox;
import javax.swing.JRadioButton;
import javax.swing.border.EtchedBorder;
import java.awt.Color;
import javax.swing.JComboBox;
import javax.swing.JSpinner;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;
import javax.swing.JButton;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import javax.swing.event.ChangeListener;

import com.mysql.jdbc.Statement;

import javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent;

public class VenVarilla extends JFrame {

	private JPanel contentPane;

	/**
	 * Launch the application.
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		EventQueue.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
			public void run() {
				try {
					VenVarilla frame = new VenVarilla();
					frame.setVisible(true);
				} catch (Exception e) {
					e.printStackTrace();
				}
			}
		});
	}

	/**
	 * Create the frame.
	 */
	public VenVarilla() {
		setBounds(100, 100, 549, 337);
		contentPane = new JPanel();
		contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(5, 5, 5, 5));
		setContentPane(contentPane);
		contentPane.setLayout(null);
		
		JPanel panel = new JPanel();
		panel.setBorder(new TitledBorder(null, "Grado", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, null));
		panel.setBounds(10, 11, 253, 87);
		contentPane.add(panel);
		panel.setLayout(null);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton = new JRadioButton("Grado 40");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton.setBounds(20, 37, 109, 23);
		panel.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_1 = new JRadioButton("Grado 60");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_1.setBounds(131, 37, 109, 23);
		panel.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_1);
		
		JPanel panel_1 = new JPanel();
		panel_1.setLayout(null);
		panel_1.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EtchedBorder(EtchedBorder.LOWERED, new Color(255, 255, 255), new Color(160, 160, 160)), "Textura", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, new Color(0, 0, 0)));
		panel_1.setBounds(10, 109, 253, 87);
		contentPane.add(panel_1);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_2 = new JRadioButton("Corrugado");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_2.setBounds(22, 37, 109, 23);
		panel_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_2);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_1_1 = new JRadioButton("Liso");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_1_1.setBounds(133, 37, 109, 23);
		panel_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_1_1);
		
		JPanel panel_1_1 = new JPanel();
		panel_1_1.setLayout(null);
		panel_1_1.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EtchedBorder(EtchedBorder.LOWERED, new Color(255, 255, 255), new Color(160, 160, 160)), "Diametro", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, new Color(0, 0, 0)));
		panel_1_1.setBounds(273, 11, 253, 87);
		contentPane.add(panel_1_1);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_3 = new JRadioButton("3/8 ");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_3.setBounds(6, 18, 109, 23);
		panel_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_3);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_4 = new JRadioButton("1/2 pulgada");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_4.setBounds(6, 44, 109, 23);
		panel_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_4);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_5 = new JRadioButton("1 pulgada");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_5.setBounds(117, 44, 109, 23);
		panel_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_5);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_6 = new JRadioButton("3/4");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_6.setBounds(117, 18, 109, 23);
		panel_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_6);
		
		JPanel panel_1_1_1 = new JPanel();
		panel_1_1_1.setLayout(null);
		panel_1_1_1.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EtchedBorder(EtchedBorder.LOWERED, new Color(255, 255, 255), new Color(160, 160, 160)), "Longitud", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, new Color(0, 0, 0)));
		panel_1_1_1.setBounds(273, 109, 253, 87);
		contentPane.add(panel_1_1_1);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_3_1 = new JRadioButton("20 pies");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_3_1.setBounds(6, 18, 109, 23);
		panel_1_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_3_1);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_4_1 = new JRadioButton("30 pies");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_4_1.setBounds(6, 44, 109, 23);
		panel_1_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_4_1);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_5_1 = new JRadioButton("40 pies");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_5_1.setBounds(117, 44, 109, 23);
		panel_1_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_5_1);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_6_1 = new JRadioButton("25 pies");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_6_1.setBounds(117, 18, 109, 23);
		panel_1_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_6_1);
		
		
		
		JLabel lblNewLabel = new JLabel("Cantidad");
		lblNewLabel.setBounds(10, 234, 78, 14);
		contentPane.add(lblNewLabel);
		
		JLabel lblVarilla = new JLabel("Precio por atado: 66,500");
		lblVarilla.setBounds(141, 231, 141, 20);
		contentPane.add(lblVarilla);
		
		
		
		JButton btnRegresar = new JButton("Regresar");
		btnRegresar.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				 VenVarilla.this.dispose();
		            setVisible(false);

			}
		});
		btnRegresar.setBounds(350, 254, 147, 33);
		contentPane.add(btnRegresar);
		
		JSpinner SPINvarilla = new JSpinner();
		SPINvarilla.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
				int Num= 66500;
	            int sp = (int) SPINvarilla.getValue();
	            int Res=66500*sp;

	            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);

	            lblVarilla.setText("Precio: "+ resu);
			}
		});
		SPINvarilla.setBounds(76, 231, 38, 20);
		contentPane.add(SPINvarilla);
		
		JButton btnCarritoV = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
		btnCarritoV.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				
				String Nombre = "Varilla";
				
				int Num= 66500;
	            int sp = (int) SPINvarilla.getValue();
	            int Res=66500*sp;
				try {
	                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
	                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

	                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

	                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
	                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res+"') ";

	                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
	                conexion.close();

	            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();

	            }catch (SQLException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();
	            }

	            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnCarritoV, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");
				
				
			}
		});
		btnCarritoV.setBounds(350, 207, 147, 33);
		contentPane.add(btnCarritoV);
		
	}
}

VenBlock:
package App;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.EventQueue;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder;
import javax.swing.JSeparator;
import javax.swing.border.TitledBorder;
import javax.swing.JButton;
import javax.swing.JTextField;
import javax.swing.JSpinner;
import javax.swing.JRadioButton;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;
import javax.swing.event.ChangeListener;

import com.mysql.jdbc.Statement;

import javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent;
import javax.swing.border.EtchedBorder;
import java.awt.Color;

public class VenBlock extends JFrame {

	private JPanel contentPane;
	private JSpinner SPINblock4;


	/**
	 * Create the frame.
	 */
	public VenBlock() {
		setResizable(false);
		setBounds(100, 100, 370, 430);
		contentPane = new JPanel();
		contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(10, 5, 10, 5));
		setContentPane(contentPane);
		contentPane.setLayout(null);
		
		JPanel panel = new JPanel();
		panel.setBorder(new TitledBorder(null, "Block", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, null));
		panel.setBounds(10, 11, 344, 227);
		contentPane.add(panel);
		panel.setLayout(null);
		
		JSpinner SPINblock4 = new JSpinner();
		SPINblock4.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
				int Num= 40;
	            int sp = (int) SPINblock4.getValue();
	            int Res=40*sp;

	            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);
	            
	          
			
			}
		});
		SPINblock4.setBounds(282, 55, 30, 20);
		panel.add(SPINblock4);
		
		JLabel lblCantidad = new JLabel(" Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad.setBounds(180, 49, 77, 33);
		panel.add(lblCantidad);
		
		JLabel lblBlock6 = new JLabel("Tama\u00F1o:6  Precio:40");
		lblBlock6.setBounds(6, 81, 135, 33);
		panel.add(lblBlock6);
		
		JLabel lblBlock8 = new JLabel("  Tama\u00F1o:8  Precio:45");
		lblBlock8.setBounds(6, 155, 135, 33);
		panel.add(lblBlock8);
		
		JLabel lblCantidad_1 = new JLabel(" Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad_1.setBounds(180, 111, 77, 33);
		panel.add(lblCantidad_1);
		
		JLabel lblCantidad_2 = new JLabel(" Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad_2.setBounds(180, 183, 77, 33);
		panel.add(lblCantidad_2);
		
		JSeparator separator = new JSeparator();
		separator.setBounds(20, 108, 344, 2);
		contentPane.add(separator);
		
		JSeparator separator_1 = new JSeparator();
		separator_1.setBounds(20, 223, 344, 2);
		contentPane.add(separator_1);
		
		
		JSpinner SPINblock6 = new JSpinner();
		SPINblock6.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
				int Num= 40;
	            int sp = (int) SPINblock6.getValue();
	            int Res=40*sp;

	            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);

	            lblBlock6.setText("Precio: "+ resu);
			}
		});
		SPINblock6.setBounds(282, 117, 30, 20);
		panel.add(SPINblock6);
		
		
		JSpinner SPINblock8 = new JSpinner();
		SPINblock8.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
				int Num= 45;
	            int sp = (int) SPINblock8.getValue();
	            int Res=45*sp;

	            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);

	            lblBlock8.setText("Precio: "+ resu);
			}
		});
		SPINblock8.setBounds(282, 189, 30, 20);
		panel.add(SPINblock8);
		
		JButton btnBLOCK8 = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
		btnBLOCK8.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				int Num2= 45;
	            int sp2 = (int) SPINblock8.getValue();
	            int Res2=45*sp2;
			   String Nombre="BLOCK 8";
				
				try {
	                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
	                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

	                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

	                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
	                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res2+"') ";

	                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
	                conexion.close();

	            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();

	            }catch (SQLException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();
	            }

	            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnBLOCK8, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

	             
				
			}
		});
		btnBLOCK8.setBounds(6, 183, 137, 33);
		panel.add(btnBLOCK8);
		
		JButton btnBLOCK6 = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
		btnBLOCK6.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				int Num2= 40;
	            int sp2 = (int) SPINblock6.getValue();
	            int Res2=40*sp2;
			   String Nombre="BLOCK 6";
				
				try {
	                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
	                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

	                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

	                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
	                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res2+"') ";

	                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
	                conexion.close();

	            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();

	            }catch (SQLException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();
	            }

	            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnBLOCK6, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

	             
				
			}
		});
		btnBLOCK6.setBounds(6, 111, 137, 33);
		panel.add(btnBLOCK6);
		
		JButton btnBLOCK4 = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
		btnBLOCK4.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				int Num2= 35;
	            int sp2 = (int) SPINblock4.getValue();
	            int Res2=35*sp2;
			   String Nombre="BLOCK 4";
				
				try {
	                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
	                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

	                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

	                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
	                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res2+"') ";

	                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
	                conexion.close();

	            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();

	            }catch (SQLException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();
	            }

	            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnBLOCK4, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

	             
				
			}
		});
		btnBLOCK4.setBounds(6, 51, 137, 33);
		panel.add(btnBLOCK4);
		
		JLabel lblBlock4 = new JLabel("Tama\u00F1o:4  Precio:35");
		lblBlock4.setBounds(6, 26, 135, 33);
		panel.add(lblBlock4);
		
		JPanel panel_1 = new JPanel();
		panel_1.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EtchedBorder(EtchedBorder.LOWERED, new Color(255, 255, 255), new Color(160, 160, 160)), "Yeso Cocido", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, new Color(0, 0, 0)));
		panel_1.setBounds(10, 249, 344, 91);
		contentPane.add(panel_1);
		panel_1.setLayout(null);
		
		JLabel lblCantidad_3 = new JLabel(" Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad_3.setBounds(175, 3, 77, 33);
		panel_1.add(lblCantidad_3);
		
		JLabel lblPrecioYeso = new JLabel("  Precio: 260");
		lblPrecioYeso.setBounds(10, 19, 135, 33);
		panel_1.add(lblPrecioYeso);
		
		JSpinner SPINyeso = new JSpinner();
		SPINyeso.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
				int Num= 260;
	            int sp = (int) SPINyeso.getValue();
	            int Res=260*sp;

	            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);

	            lblPrecioYeso.setText("Precio: "+ resu);
			
			}
		});
		SPINyeso.setBounds(283, 16, 30, 20);
		panel_1.add(SPINyeso);
		
		JButton btnYESO = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
		btnYESO.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				int Num2= 260;
	            int sp2 = (int) SPINyeso.getValue();
	            int Res2=260*sp2;
			   String Nombre="Yeso Cocido";
				
				try {
	                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
	                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

	                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

	                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
	                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res2+"') ";

	                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
	                conexion.close();

	            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();

	            }catch (SQLException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();
	            }

	            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnYESO, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

			}
		});
		btnYESO.setBounds(175, 47, 137, 33);
		panel_1.add(btnYESO);
		
		JButton btnRegresar = new JButton("Regresar");
		btnRegresar.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VenBlock.this.dispose();
	            setVisible(false);
			}
		});
		btnRegresar.setBounds(110, 351, 147, 33);
		contentPane.add(btnRegresar);
		
		
	}
}

VenMortero:
package App;

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.EventQueue;

import javax.swing.JFrame;
import javax.swing.JPanel;
import javax.swing.border.EmptyBorder;
import javax.swing.JSeparator;
import javax.swing.border.TitledBorder;
import javax.swing.JButton;
import javax.swing.JTextField;
import javax.swing.JSpinner;
import javax.swing.JRadioButton;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import javax.swing.border.EtchedBorder;
import java.awt.Color;
import javax.swing.JLabel;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;
import javax.swing.event.ChangeListener;

import com.mysql.jdbc.Statement;

import javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent;

public class VenMortero extends JFrame {

	private JPanel contentPane;


	/**
	 * Create the frame.
	 */
	public VenMortero() {
		setTitle("Mortero");
		setResizable(false);
		setBounds(100, 100, 380, 380);
		contentPane = new JPanel();
		contentPane.setBorder(new EmptyBorder(10, 5, 10, 5));
		setContentPane(contentPane);
		contentPane.setLayout(null);
		
		JPanel panel = new JPanel();
		panel.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EtchedBorder(EtchedBorder.LOWERED, new Color(255, 255, 255), new Color(160, 160, 160)), "Mortero Grueso", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, new Color(0, 0, 0)));
		panel.setBounds(10, 11, 344, 86);
		contentPane.add(panel);
		panel.setLayout(null);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton = new JRadioButton("Mortero Grueso");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton.setBounds(6, 17, 109, 23);
		panel.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton);
		
		JLabel lblCantidad_1 = new JLabel("Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad_1.setBounds(117, 11, 78, 14);
		panel.add(lblCantidad_1);
		
		
		
		JLabel lblGrueso1 = new JLabel("  Precio: 270");
		lblGrueso1.setBounds(205, 12, 129, 33);
		panel.add(lblGrueso1);
		
		JPanel panel_1_1 = new JPanel();
		panel_1_1.setLayout(null);
		panel_1_1.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EtchedBorder(EtchedBorder.LOWERED, new Color(255, 255, 255), new Color(160, 160, 160)), "Mortero Fino", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, new Color(0, 0, 0)));
		panel_1_1.setBounds(10, 205, 344, 83);
		contentPane.add(panel_1_1);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnNewRadioButton_3_1 = new JRadioButton("Mortero Fino");
		rdbtnNewRadioButton_3_1.setBounds(6, 13, 109, 36);
		panel_1_1.add(rdbtnNewRadioButton_3_1);
		
		JLabel lblCantidad_1_2 = new JLabel("Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad_1_2.setBounds(123, 13, 92, 14);
		panel_1_1.add(lblCantidad_1_2);
		
		
		
		JLabel lblFino1 = new JLabel("  Precio: 330");
		lblFino1.setBounds(201, 15, 133, 33);
		panel_1_1.add(lblFino1);
		
		JPanel panel_1 = new JPanel();
		panel_1.setLayout(null);
		panel_1.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EtchedBorder(EtchedBorder.LOWERED, new Color(255, 255, 255), new Color(160, 160, 160)), "Mortero Normal", TitledBorder.LEADING, TitledBorder.TOP, null, new Color(0, 0, 0)));
		panel_1.setBounds(10, 108, 344, 86);
		contentPane.add(panel_1);
		
		JRadioButton rdbtnMorteroNormal = new JRadioButton("Mortero Normal");
		rdbtnMorteroNormal.setBounds(6, 17, 109, 23);
		panel_1.add(rdbtnMorteroNormal);
		
		JLabel lblCantidad_1_1 = new JLabel("Cantidad:");
		lblCantidad_1_1.setBounds(120, 11, 78, 14);
		panel_1.add(lblCantidad_1_1);
		
		
		
		JLabel lblNormal1 = new JLabel("  Precio: 300");
		lblNormal1.setBounds(208, 12, 126, 33);
		panel_1.add(lblNormal1);
		
		JSpinner SPINnormal1 = new JSpinner();
		SPINnormal1.setBounds(119, 25, 46, 20);
		panel_1.add(SPINnormal1);
		
		JButton btnCarritoM2 = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
		btnCarritoM2.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				int Num2= 300;
	            int sp2 = (int) SPINnormal1.getValue();
	            int Res2=300*sp2;
			   String Nombre="Mortero Normal";
				
				try {
	                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
	                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

	                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

	                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
	                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res2+"') ";

	                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
	                conexion.close();

	            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();

	            }catch (SQLException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();
	            }

	            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnCarritoM2, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

	             
				
			}
			
				
			
		});
		btnCarritoM2.setBounds(197, 42, 137, 33);
		panel_1.add(btnCarritoM2);
		
		JSpinner SPINgrueso = new JSpinner();
		SPINgrueso.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
				int Num= 270;
	            int sp = (int) SPINgrueso.getValue();
	            int Res=270*sp;

	            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);

	            lblGrueso1.setText("Precio: "+ resu);
	            
	            
	            JSpinner SPINnormal = new JSpinner();
	    		SPINnormal.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
	    			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
	    				int Num= 300;
	    	            int sp = (int) SPINnormal.getValue();
	    	            int Res=300*sp;

	    	            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);

	    	            lblNormal1.setText("Precio: "+ resu);
	    			}
	    		});
	    		SPINnormal.setBounds(130, 25, 30, 20);
	    		panel_1.add(SPINnormal);
	            
			}
		});
		SPINgrueso.setBounds(117, 25, 48, 20);
		panel.add(SPINgrueso);
		
		JButton btnCarritoM1 = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
		btnCarritoM1.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				int Num2= 270;
	            int sp2 = (int) SPINgrueso.getValue();
	            int Res2=270*sp2;
			   String Nombre="Mortero Grueso";
				
				try {
	                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
	                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

	                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

	                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
	                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res2+"') ";

	                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
	                conexion.close();

	            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();

	            }catch (SQLException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();
	            }

	            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnCarritoM1, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

	             
				
			}
			
		});
		btnCarritoM1.setBounds(197, 39, 137, 33);
		panel.add(btnCarritoM1);
		
		JSpinner SPINfino = new JSpinner();
		SPINfino.addChangeListener(new ChangeListener() {
			public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
				int Num= 300;
	            int sp = (int) SPINfino.getValue();
	            int Res=300*sp;

	            String resu = String.valueOf(Res);

	            lblFino1.setText("Precio: "+ resu);
			}
		});
		SPINfino.setBounds(121, 29, 51, 20);
		panel_1_1.add(SPINfino);
		
		JButton btnCarritoM3 = new JButton("Agregar al Carrito");
		btnCarritoM3.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				int Num2= 330;
	            int sp2 = (int) SPINfino.getValue();
	            int Res2=330*sp2;
			   String Nombre="Mortero Fino";
				
				try {
	                Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
	                java.sql.Connection conexion = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/almacon1","root","");

	                Statement sm = (Statement) conexion.createStatement();

	                String DB = "INSERT INTO productos(Nombre_Producto,Precio_Producto)"
	                		+ " VALUES('"+Nombre+"','"+Res2+"') ";

	                sm.executeUpdate(DB);
	                conexion.close();

	            }catch (ClassNotFoundException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();

	            }catch (SQLException a1) {
	                a1.printStackTrace();
	            }

	            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(btnCarritoM3, "Producto guardado en el Carrito");

	             
				
			
			}
		});
		btnCarritoM3.setBounds(197, 39, 137, 33);
		panel_1_1.add(btnCarritoM3);
		
		JButton btnRegresar = new JButton("Regresar");
		btnRegresar.addActionListener(new ActionListener() {
			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
				VenMortero.this.dispose();
	            setVisible(false);

			}
		});
		btnRegresar.setBounds(109, 299, 137, 33);
		contentPane.add(btnRegresar);
	}
}
